com.android.car.internal.util

类 FunctionalUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.android.car.internal.util.FunctionalUtils

  • public final class FunctionalUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Utilities specific to functional programming

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      static interface  FunctionalUtils.RemoteExceptionIgnoringConsumer<T>
      A Consumer that automatically ignores any RemoteExceptions.
      static interface  FunctionalUtils.ThrowingBiConsumer<A,B>
      A BiConsumer that allows throwing checked exceptions from its single abstract method.
      static interface  FunctionalUtils.ThrowingBiFunction<T,U,R>
      A BiFunction that allows throwing checked exceptions from its single abstract method.
      static interface  FunctionalUtils.ThrowingChecked2Consumer<Input,ExceptionOne extends java.lang.Exception,ExceptionTwo extends java.lang.Exception>
      A Consumer that allows the caller to specify 2 different custom checked Exceptions that can be thrown by the implementer.
      static interface  FunctionalUtils.ThrowingCheckedConsumer<Input,ExceptionType extends java.lang.Exception>
      A Consumer that allows the caller to specify a custom checked Exception that can be thrown by the implementer.
      static interface  FunctionalUtils.ThrowingCheckedFunction<Input,Output,ExceptionType extends java.lang.Exception>
      A Function that allows the caller to specify a custom checked Exception that can be thrown by the implementer.
      static interface  FunctionalUtils.ThrowingConsumer<T>
      A Consumer that allows throwing checked exceptions from its single abstract method.
      static interface  FunctionalUtils.ThrowingFunction<T,R>
      A Function that allows throwing checked exceptions from its single abstract method.
      static interface  FunctionalUtils.ThrowingRunnable
      An equivalent of Runnable that allows throwing checked exceptions This can be used to specify a lambda argument without forcing all the checked exceptions to be handled within it
      static interface  FunctionalUtils.ThrowingSupplier<T>
      An equivalent of Supplier that allows throwing checked exceptions This can be used to specify a lambda argument without forcing all the checked exceptions to be handled within it

      所有方法 静态方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      static java.lang.String getLambdaName(java.lang.Object function)
      Gets a user-friendly name for a lambda function.
      static java.lang.Runnable handleExceptions(FunctionalUtils.ThrowingRunnable r, java.util.function.Consumer<java.lang.Throwable> handler)
      Wraps the given FunctionalUtils.ThrowingRunnable into one that handles any exceptions using the provided handler
      static <T> java.util.function.Consumer<T> ignoreRemoteException(FunctionalUtils.RemoteExceptionIgnoringConsumer<T> action)
      Wraps a given action into one that ignores any RemoteExceptions
      static <A,B> java.util.function.BiConsumer<A,B> uncheckExceptions(FunctionalUtils.ThrowingBiConsumer<A,B> action) 
      static <T> java.util.function.Consumer<T> uncheckExceptions(FunctionalUtils.ThrowingConsumer<T> action)
      Converts a lambda expression that throws a checked exception(s) into a regular Consumer by propagating any checked exceptions as RuntimeException
      static <I,O> java.util.function.Function<I,O> uncheckExceptions(FunctionalUtils.ThrowingFunction<I,O> action) 
      static java.lang.Runnable uncheckExceptions(FunctionalUtils.ThrowingRunnable action) 
      static <T> java.util.function.Supplier<T> uncheckExceptions(FunctionalUtils.ThrowingSupplier<T> action)

      • uncheckExceptions

        public static <T> java.util.function.Consumer<T> uncheckExceptions(FunctionalUtils.ThrowingConsumer<T> action)
        Converts a lambda expression that throws a checked exception(s) into a regular Consumer by propagating any checked exceptions as RuntimeException
